posts.post_title: T201 MECCA PSA CROSSOVER TO SGC Help - KILLIAN
posts.post_content:
Hey All!

I am looking to cross over this PSA 3.5 VG+ Killian/Fitzpatrick to SGC.  looking for the same or higher SGC grade.  If higher I will add some cash.  let me know if there is any interest.

Thanks!

Cliff
